name: Salmon en Croute
ingredients: salmon fillets, puff pastry, spinach, cream cheese, lemon zest, dill, egg, salt, pepper
quantities: 4 salmon fillets, 1 sheet puff pastry, 2 cups spinach, 1/2 cup cream cheese, 1 tsp lemon zest, 1 tbsp chopped dill, 1 egg, salt and pepper to taste
recipe:
1. Mix 2 cups wilted spinach, 1/2 cup cream cheese, 1 tsp lemon zest, and 1 tbsp chopped dill.
2. Season 4 salmon fillets with salt and pepper.
3. Roll out 1 sheet puff pastry, place a salmon fillet in the center.
4. Spread spinach mixture over the salmon.
5. Fold pastry over the salmon, sealing the edges.
6. Brush with beaten egg and bake until pastry is golden and salmon is cooked through.
